sentences.sentence: Amphotericin B liposome has good effect on infection of Ochroconis gallopava.
sentences.translation: 两性霉素B脂质体治疗本病疗效显著。

sentences.sentence: Methods The amphotericin B liposome was prepared by the film-supersound method.
sentences.translation: 方法用薄膜超声法制备两性霉素B脂质体；

sentences.sentence: Furthermore, the patients with positive GM test received preemptive antifungal therapy with amphotericin B or itraconazole.
sentences.translation: 对GM实验阳性的患者给予两性霉素B或伊曲康唑抢先抗曲霉治疗。
